name: AH Twitter Timeline Widget
author: Andreas Hecht

sections.description:
Creates a new and simple to use widget that outputs the new awesome Twitter Embedded Timeline from your Twitter account. Looks nice in Sidebar and Footer.

How to use the Widget

Activate Plugin, drag »AH Twitter Timeline Widget« into your Sidebar or Footer, fill out the form of the widget and you are ready!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Ready to use!
sections.faq:
None at this time.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Ready to use!
